name: Pair_zipTest
description: Unit tests for the Pair.zip method, which zips two lists into a list of pairs.

test_cases.name: testZipStrictEqualSizes
test_cases.description: Tests the zip functionality with two lists of equal sizes and strict mode enabled.

test_cases.name: testZipStrictDifferentSizes
test_cases.description: Tests the zip functionality with two lists of different sizes and strict mode enabled, expecting an AssertionError.

test_cases.name: testZipNonStrict
test_cases.description: Tests the zip functionality with two lists of different sizes and strict mode disabled.
